description: Global hashrates, shares, balance and revenue estimation

targets.query: SELECT sum(balance_increase)/1000000000000000000 FROM (select non_negative_difference("result") AS balance_increase FROM "flexpool_balance" WHERE "miner" =~ /^$miner$/ AND $timeFilter) GROUP BY time(1d) TZ('$timezone');

SELECT sum(balance_increase)/1000000000000000000*$exchange_rate FROM (select non_negative_difference("result") AS balance_increase FROM "flexpool_balance" WHERE "miner" =~ /^$miner$/ AND $timeFilter) GROUP BY time(1d) TZ('$timezone');
SELECT sum(blocks_increase) FROM (select non_negative_difference("confirmed") AS blocks_increase FROM "flexpool_pool_block_count" WHERE $timeFilter) GROUP BY time(1d) TZ('$timezone');

SELECT sum(balance_increase)/1000000000000000000 FROM (select non_negative_difference("result") AS balance_increase FROM "flexpool_balance" WHERE "miner" =~ /^$miner$/ AND $timeFilter) GROUP BY time(31d) TZ('$timezone');

SELECT sum(balance_increase)/1000000000000000000*$exchange_rate FROM (select non_negative_difference("result") AS balance_increase FROM "flexpool_balance" WHERE "miner" =~ /^$miner$/ AND $timeFilter) GROUP BY time(31d) TZ('$timezone');
SELECT sum(blocks_increase) FROM (select non_negative_difference("confirmed") AS blocks_increase FROM "flexpool_pool_block_count" WHERE $timeFilter) GROUP BY time(31d) TZ('$timezone');
SELECT mean("result")/1000000000000000000 FROM "flexpool_balance" WHERE ("miner" =~ /^$miner$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("result")/1000000000000000000*$exchange_rate FROM "flexpool_balance" WHERE ("miner" =~ /^$miner$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("result")/1000000000000000000 FROM "flexpool_balance" WHERE ("miner" =~ /^$miner$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("result")/1000000000000000000*$exchange_rate  FROM "flexpool_balance" WHERE ("miner" =~ /^$miner$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("result")/1000000000000000000 FROM "flexpool_daily_revenue_estimation" WHERE ("miner" =~ /^$miner$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("result")/1000000000000000000 FROM "flexpool_daily_revenue_estimation" WHERE ("miner" =~ /^$miner$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("result")/1000000000000000000*$exchange_rate FROM "flexpool_daily_revenue_estimation" WHERE ("miner" =~ /^$miner$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("result")/1000000000000000000 FROM "flexpool_paid" WHERE ("miner" =~ /^$miner$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("result")/1000000000000000000*$exchange_rate FROM "flexpool_paid" WHERE ("miner" =~ /^$miner$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("result")/1000000000000000000 FROM "flexpool_paid" WHERE ("miner" =~ /^$miner$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("result")/1000000000000000000*$exchange_rate FROM "flexpool_paid" WHERE ("miner" =~ /^$miner$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT "amount"/1000000000000000000,  "amount"/1000000000000000000*$exchange_rate as "amount (fiat)",  "duration" FROM "flexpool_payments" WHERE ("miner" =~ /^$miner$/) order by time desc limit 6

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM currencies WITH KEY = "to"
list.name: currency
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM currencies WITH KEY = "to"

list.definition: select value from currencies where "to" =~ /^$currency$/ order by desc limit 1
